descriptor.name: LusH with PridE Beard Wash-E (gender - female) by BPC Store
descriptor.short_desc: A vegan & natural Kashayam based wash made from herbs carefully selected from Indian Herbology made for a complete beard and moustache care.  Range:             Beard Range Type:                Liquid Age:                  15+ Weight:           Gross Weight - 112 gms, Net Weight - 100 mL Beard Type:    Normal, Dry & Frizzy, Infected and Patchy Beard  Ingredients: Coconut (Cocos nucifera), Indian gooseberry (Phyllanthus emblica), Bermuda grass (Cynodon dactylon), Bhringraj (Eclipta alba), Castor (Ricinus communis), Indian madder (Rubia cordifolia), Fenugreek (Trigonella Foenum-Graecum), Hibiscus (Hibiscus rosa-sinensis), Ginger (Zingiber officinale), Pomegranate (Punica granatum)
descriptor.long_desc: Benefits:   Chemical fragrance, SLS, SLES, polysorbate, PEG & paraben free  A natural, skin-friendly conditioning beard and moustache wash.  Specially formulated to deal with different kinds of hair that deal with beard and moustache.  Thoroughly cleans without stripping the natural oil away from the beard.  Helpful against beardruff, hair loss, itching, rashes & wrinkles.  No paraben, additives or GMOs.   USP: Keeps the beard clean, soft, manageable, shiny & tangle free.

descriptor.long_desc: It can be used to hydrate the hair or used with the shampoo and conditioner.  It can be added to laundry for fresh smelling clothes.  It can be added to food.   USP: For the ultimate rejuvenation.
